attributes.action: remove the traffic lights from Crossfield/Barton Stretch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The traffic lights were on for just one day before utter chaos broke out. People were left queuing in standstill traffic for over an hour to get out of Irlam. These traffic lights cause nothing but problems and are frankly uterly pointless. They are causing heavier traffic in rush hour than what was there before and will be the reason for accidents. We ask for them to be removed.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
